query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients) as clients_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meals) as meals_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drinks) as drinks_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM body_metrics) as body_metrics_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutrition_goals) as nutrition_goals_count;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Acm1QzHQhQUgLe.35139a5d2a11 --database CVoYWTwV8QMMBSnZsHHM3q --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients) as clients_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meals) as meals_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drinks) as drinks_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM body_metrics) as body_metrics_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nutrition_goals) as nutrition_goals_count;
